# Naaz Commercial Institute - Hope | Health | Education

Naaz Commercial Institute (NGO) provides vocational training, skill development, and community programs to empower individuals and create sustainable livelihoods.

## Overview

[Naaz Commercial InstituteJehanabad, Bihar](https://naazcommercialinstitute.in/): This page provides information about the Naaz Commercial Institute located in Jehanabad, Bihar, detailing its mission and the services it offers to the community.

[About](https://naazcommercialinstitute.in/about): This section outlines the vision, mission, and objectives of the Naaz Commercial Institute, highlighting its commitment to education and community development.

## Impact

[Impact](https://naazcommercialinstitute.in/impact): This page discusses the positive effects and outcomes of the programs offered by the Naaz Commercial Institute, showcasing success stories and statistics that demonstrate its influence on the community.

## Community Engagement

[Stories](https://naazcommercialinstitute.in/stories): This section shares personal narratives and stories from individuals who have benefited from the institute's programs, illustrating the transformative power of vocational training and skill development.

[Support Us](https://naazcommercialinstitute.in/donate): This page provides information on how individuals and organizations can contribute to the Naaz Commercial Institute, including donation options and volunteer opportunities.

## Contact Information

[nksjahanabad@gmail.com](mailto:nksjahanabad@gmail.com): This is the official email address for contacting the Naaz Commercial Institute for inquiries or support.

[+91-9097351490](tel:+91-9097351490): This is the contact phone number for reaching out to the Naaz Commercial Institute for further information or assistance.
